thread.title: Child run over as he got off a school bus near Te Aroha
thread.title_full: Child run over as he got off a school bus near Te Aroha

author: Katrina Tanirau
title: Child run over as he got off a school bus near Te Aroha
text:
Child run over as he got off a school bus near Te Aroha KATRINA TANIRAU Last updated 17:24, February 21 2017 KATRINA TANIRAU/FAIRFAX NZ 
A child was hit by an SUV towing a boat trailer on First Avenue North, Waihou, on Tuesday afternoon. 
A child has been seriously injured after he was run over by an SUV towing a boat trailer after being dropped off by a school bus. 
The incident happened just after 3pm on Tuesday, in Waihou, near Te Aroha, in the eastern Waikato. 
The child, aged between 10 and 11 years old, could be heard screaming after going under the car and trailer, police senior sergeant Peter van de Wetering said. SIMON MAUDE/FAIRFAX NZ 
The child is reported to have been dropped off by a school bus shortly before he was hit. 
The child was conscious, but distressed, van de Wetering said.
